General: - Pause no longer restricted before 3 minutes (we plan to bring this back in the future, but we want to allow this for now while we are early and have technical issues sometimes)

Bebop: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb no longer has a cap (was 15 stacks)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb scaling per hero reduced from 4% to 3% (previous uncapped was 2.5%)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb still loses 2 stacks on death
- Fixed some hook bugs causing it to sometimes not grab heroes near cover but still in collision range
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook collision against troopers reduced to 12 (default is 33)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook no longer kills troopers (so you can bomb/uppercut/melee them)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam duration increased from 10s to 11s

Torment Pulse: - Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse now scales with cooldown again
- Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Spirit power scaling reduced from 0.33 to 0.3
Ethereal Shift: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Ethereal Shift|Size=20} Ethereal Shift scaling with duration

Sticky Bomb: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb no longer has a cap (was 15 stacks)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb scaling per hero reduced from 4% to 3% (previous uncapped was 2.5%)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20} Sticky Bomb still loses 2 stacks on death
Hook: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook collision against troopers reduced to 12 (default is 33)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20} Hook no longer kills troopers (so you can bomb/uppercut/melee them)
Hyper Beam: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Hyper Beam|Size=20} Hyper Beam duration increased from 10s to 11s
Pulse: - Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse now scales with cooldown again
- Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Spirit power scaling reduced from 0.33 to 0.3
